section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para: Delegation Service has been updated to use the latest version of Java WS Core, which now supports the final version of WSRF/WSN specification. This service is not compatible with the previous stable versions, GT 4.0.x.

The Java WS Authentication and Message component has been updated to support RFC 3820 proxies by default as described here. This implies that credentials delegated in the previous stable version are incompatible with this version.
